languages.text: {n}Подростки ловят каждое ваше слово, затаив дыхание. Лишь несколько с дальнего края шеренги кажутся хмурыми и не слишком впечатленными речью.{/n}
{n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Подростки ловят каждое ваше слово, затаив дыхание. Лишь несколько с дальнего края шеренги кажутся хмурыми и не слишком впечатленными речью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The children hang on every word you say with bated breath. Only a few teenagers from the far end of the column seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}
{n}The children hang on every word you say with bated breath. Only a few teenagers from the far end of the column seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}
{n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}
{n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}
{n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}
{n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}

languages.text: {n}孩子们屏息凝神，认真地听着你的每一句话。只有远处的几名少年看起来闷闷不乐，并没有被你的讲话所感染。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}孩子们屏息凝神，认真地听着你的每一句话。只有远处的几名少年看起来闷闷不乐，并没有被你的讲话所感染。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los jóvenes escuchan atentamente tus palabras, conteniendo la respiración. Solo unos pocos al fondo de la fila se muestran deprimidos y poco impresionados por tus palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los niños escuchan atentamente tus palabras, conteniendo la respiración. Solo unos pocos adolescentes al fondo de la fila se muestran deprimidos y poco impresionados por tus palabras.{/n}

languages.text: {n}青少年たちは固唾を飲んであなたの一言一言に耳を傾けている。列の一番端にいる数人だけが、不機嫌そうな態度を示していた。あなたの演説に対して、特に感銘を受けていないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}青少年たちは固唾を飲んであなたの一言一言に耳を傾けている。列の一番端にいる数人だけが、不機嫌そうな態度を示していた。あなたの演説に対して、特に感銘を受けていないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Jugendlichen hängen mit angehaltenem Atem an deinen Lippen. Nur einige wenige am hintersten Ende der Reihe wirken mürrisch und nicht sonderlich beeindruckt von deiner Rede.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kinder hängen mit angehaltenem Atem an deinen Lippen. Nur einige Teenager am anderen Ende der Reihe wirken mürrisch und nicht sonderlich beeindruckt von deiner Rede.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les jeunes gens retiennent leur souffle en vous écoutant parler, pendus à vos lèvres. Seuls quelques adolescents au bout de la rangée affichent une mine maussade et ne semblent pas particulièrement impressionnés par votre discours.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les enfants retiennent leur souffle en vous écoutant parler, pendus à vos lèvres. Seuls quelques adolescents au bout de la rangée affichent une mine maussade et ne semblent pas particulièrement impressionnés par votre discours.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kesik nefesler alıp veren gençler, söylediklerini tartıyor. Sıranın en ucundaki birkaçının suratı asık, konuşmandan etkilenmemişe benziyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers hang on your every word with bated breath. Only a few at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed by your speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gençler, kesik nefesler alıp verirken söylediklerini tartıyor. Sıranın en ucundaki birkaç gencin suratı asık, konuşmandan etkilenmemişe benziyorlar.{/n}
